attributes.action: Instate a National Government during the creation of British policies post EU
attributes.additional_details: Similar national governments have been employed previously within the UK during the great depression and times of war.
attributes.background:
Currently there is a large amount of uncertainty in both major political parties, even though good leadership is needed now more than any point over the recent years.
A National government is a coalition made of MPs from across all parties, with the specific aim of organising the EU departure.
